lenders.name: Mia
lenders.loan_because:
The Lord says in Isaiah 58:

"Is not this the fast that I choose:
   to loose the bonds of injustice,
   to undo the thongs of the yoke,
to let the oppressed go free,
   and to break every yoke?
7Is it not to share your bread with the hungry,
   and bring the homeless poor into your house;
when you see the naked, to cover them,
   and not to hide yourself from your own kin?
8Then your light shall break forth like the dawn,
   and your healing shall spring up quickly;
your vindicator* shall go before you,
   the glory of the Lord shall be your rearguard.
9Then you shall call, and the Lord will answer;
   you shall cry for help, and he will say, Here I am. "
lenders.occupational_info: I work with college students for a campus ministry called InterVarsity Christian Fellowship. I'm an intern so I also have a desk job to pay the bills in the meantime. (=

lenders.loan_because:
Mark Twain once said that a banker is someone who lends you an umbrella when it is sunny and requests it back when it pours.  We may all be able to do otherwise.   Besides, I find teaching how to catch a fish proves to be more sustainable than giving a fish.

Loosing money because of defaulted loans happens but these are small amounts, much smaller than any donation I give.

.
lenders.occupational_info: I am part of a team designing,  building and validating pharmaceutical facilities

lenders.name: Myron Gushlak
lenders.loan_because: The Myron Gushlak Foundation was created as a venue to support a diversity of causes. The Foundation strives for transparency in the increasingly opaque world of charitable contributions. The Foundation targets institutions with a high ratio of assistance to administration – those who end up dispensing the largest possible percentage of assets to the targeted need.
lenders.occupational_info: My wishes are to maintain a diversity of causes. At present, the only criteria is need when that need can be effectively and efficiently supported financially.

lenders.occupational_info: it is a never ending demand in the market. everyday we use cloths and would deffinitly need to clean them but not everybody have the time to do this cleaning and that is where i come into picture to bridge the gap for those people who do not have that time to do them. i love my job and very passionate about it.

lenders.name: Sandra
lenders.loan_because: i´ve got the chance to improve my living standards and so I want to give others this chance!

lenders.name: claude
lenders.loan_because:
I am trying to start a candles business. Here is where I am going to let you all know about the candles we will be selling, as well as price updates, and a special value deal, that will be available to all online and home purchases  :)  
 
Our candle will be an 8oz jar candle. They will be scented with essential oils, and have a zinc free wick. The candles will be made from soy wax, in which the wax is 98% soy, and 2% additives. The additives are harmless, and are only used for keeping the scent locked evenly throughout the candle, not allowing the scent to separate from the wax. At this point, I will only be looking to offer the 8oz jar candle, however, I do have plans with adding a larger jar in the near future. I am just not sure if it will be a 16oz or a 32oz. That will be something I will ask you, the customers, on what you would prefer. I guess however, at some point, we could offer all 3 sizes  :)  :)  :)
 
The price I have in mind for our candles is going to be a very fair price. Our candles will be of great quality, if not better than the well known Yankee Candle...I actually went to the Yankee Candle website, and they offer a 3.5 oz jar candle, for a price of $10.99. The actual price of my candles will be cheaper for sure, and that's for an 8oz candle!!! We will also be offering an everyday special. Those who would like to buy their products from me directly, from my home or when I get a home store, will have the option of buying 5 candles, and getting 1 free!!!For those of you who buy online, there will be a special to help you with your shipping costs...If you buy exactly 5 jar candles, your shipping will be free  :)  :)  :)  I will say that the candle price I will be setting my candles at, will be less than $10 per candle!!!
 
Not only will you get a great value, for a great price, but you will also have the option of donating .50 from each candle to a charity of your choice. Each month, there will be 5 different non-profit organizations such as the Red Cross, Salvation Army, Operation Christmas Child, and even charities that you, the customers, choose to be worthy of such cause  :)  You will have the option to choose where EACH .50 donation will go. If you want 3 of the .50 donations to go to the Red Cross, and then 2 donations to go to the Salvation Army, then that would be just fine, as long as you bought 5 jar candles :)
 
For all of you who are afraid of allergic reactions, I have that all figured out as well  :)  There will be a link on the actual website, when I get one up and going, that will work like a MSDS. It will be a link you click, and then you will have the option of clicking a scent. It will then show you every ingredient that is in that scented jar candle. This way, if anyone has any thoughts that they may get a allergic reaction, they could even take the info to their doctor, and they could let them know if there could be any allergic issues  :)  
 
This company is going to thrive on quality and customer satisfaction!!!We also hope to grow to provide all of our customers with the largest selection of scented jar candles available from any one place  :)  That's right, I will do everything I can to get the most scents possible. However, I want to also give you the scents you want as well. So please let me know what scents you enjoy,or would like to see become available, and I will try my best to get it!!!!This is all only possible with your help, especially in this fundraiser. Please, if there is a way for you to participate in any fashion, please do so. This fundraiser will determine how many scents will be available when we start taking orders in mid July  :)  The more help, the more scents  :)  I will be posting a potential starting scent list, probably around 1 week after the fundraiser. Once all of the donations are received, and counted up, I will have a much better idea of how many scents will be possible to offer  :)  
 
Thank you all so, so, so much for all of your help and support  :)    I look forward to providing great quality candles to all of you very soon  :)  Thank you all again, and I hope that we will have many years of candle enjoyment ahead of us all  :)  :)  :)
